org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

类 CompoundBloomFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CompoundBloomFilterBase
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CompoundBloomFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    BloomFilter, BloomFilterBase

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class CompoundBloomFilter
extends CompoundBloomFilterBase
implements BloomFilter
    A Bloom filter implementation built on top of BloomFilterChunk, encapsulating a set of fixed-size Bloom filters written out at the time of HFile generation into the data block stream, and loaded on demand at query time. This class only provides reading capabilities.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CompoundBloomFilter

        public CompoundBloomFilter(DataInput meta,
                           HFile.Reader reader)
                    throws IOException
        De-serialization for compound Bloom filter metadata. Must be consistent with what CompoundBloomFilterWriter does.
        参数:
        meta - serialized Bloom filter metadata without any magic blocks
        抛出:
        IOException

    • 方法详细资料

      • contains

        public boolean contains(byte[] key,
                        int keyOffset,
                        int keyLength,
                        ByteBuff bloom)
        从接口复制的说明: BloomFilter
        Check if the specified key is contained in the bloom filter.
        指定者:
        contains 在接口中 BloomFilter
        参数:
        key - data to check for existence of
        keyOffset - offset into the data
        keyLength - length of the data
        bloom - bloom filter data to search. This can be null if auto-loading is supported.
        返回:
        true if matched by bloom, false if not

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Cell keyCell,
                        ByteBuff bloom,
                        BloomType type)
        从接口复制的说明: BloomFilter
        Check if the specified key is contained in the bloom filter.
        指定者:
        contains 在接口中 BloomFilter
        参数:
        keyCell - the key to check for the existence of
        bloom - bloom filter data to search. This can be null if auto-loading is supported.
        type - The type of Bloom ROW/ ROW_COL
        返回:
        true if matched by bloom, false if not

      • supportsAutoLoading

        public boolean supportsAutoLoading()
        指定者:
        supportsAutoLoading 在接口中 BloomFilter
        返回:
        true if this Bloom filter can automatically load its data and thus allows a null byte buffer to be passed to contains()
